name: DailyWalkGame
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily walk game
des:
It is a skill to enjoy a walk. Let's go outside with the skill.
You need to use a device that can get location information. It's the Alexa App and Echo Buds.

OVERVIEW
When the skill is Launched, it announces the direction and distance of the goal. Walk towards that point. And when you reach the goal point, please "check". The skill measures whether the direction is correct and how close the distance is to the destination, and announces the results. If the directions match and the distance difference is 0, you are great.
The distance announced by the skill is around 1000 meters.

VOICE COMMAND
HINT : You can know the current direction and distance.
CHECK : Finish the game and judge.
NEW GAME : Start a new game.
HELP : Give skill help.
CANCEL / STOP / NO : Finish the skill.

CONVERSATION FLOW EXAMPLE
User: Launch the skill.
Alexa : This is the starting point. Is it OK to use location information?
User : OK.
 (Get location information.)
Alexa: Announce direction and distance. Let's get started.
 (Let's walk toward the goal point.)
User: Give me a hint.
Alexa: Give you a hint.
User: When you get to your destination, say "check".
Alexa: Announcement of results.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Registering this skill in a routine will help you take a walk on a regular basis. You can also pre-set the direction you want to go by using routines to launch your skill.

WARNING
Please walk on the sidewalk.
If the direction specified by the skill is dangerous, stop using it. Or change your destination.
For example, cliffs, seas, rivers, highways, railroad tracks, exclusion zones, private land etc.
Do not use on days when it is not suitable for a walk. For example, rain, storm etc.
